lines.text: Son, you don't want to do what you're thinkin'
You can't talk to him, huh?
All right, Ben... he touches his gun, I go to you first and then him.
That's a stylish bluff... makes a poor child stop and consider... almost like you think you can take us both.
Well, I got no reason to doubt it.
The only law you got is this piece of tin worth about two bits...
[drops his marshal badge on the justice of the peace's desk]

[Coming across Alonzo and an Indian tracker]
Well, a town marshal that hires trackers!
We got our eyes watchin' every move Mr. Ben Irons makes. He and his partner will lay low for a while and then try to edge their way out.
You run the hounds and then Ward comes in for the kill. What does he do then? Throw you a bone?
Man pays me a wage - I give him a day's work.
He don't make me do anything I don't want too!
Darryl, are you gonna discuss our business or get it done?
